<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Graceful Poise](/Feats.aspx?ID=422) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
<trait label="Stance" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=152" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 153 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Double Slice](/Feats.aspx?ID=356)

</column>

---

With the right positioning, your off-hand weapon can strike like a scorpion's stinger. While you are in this stance, if you make your second Strike from Double Slice with an [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170) weapon, Double Slice counts as one attack when calculating your multiple attack penalty.
name: Graceful Poise
